stories.text:
I currently work in a good open source project, as a core developer in a medium sized organisation, I came across an early stage startup opportunity regarding providing support and deployment of this, in this I would be working on a dev+support opportunity instead of working on core.

I work in Indian market, and the pay is more than twice my current pay, if I work at this startup + I would be able to learn the pains and pleasures of working at a startup. I am not sure am I making right decision moving from core team to more support based role or not, I have 3 yrs work experience working at tech and thought it might be good time to explore my risk appetite, but am I taking risk on right project or not I have doubts regarding it.

I got this feedback from my mentor/Team Lead and wanted to check with Industry folks how will it impact my future employment, what other things should I check?
stories.title: Moving from dev- support+dev role (early stage startup)more than twice the pay
